name: ShadowLight (ReLost)
description:
Description

1vs1 black&white-theamed platformer inspired by Samurai Jack animation. Sneak in your warrior's color background and slay your enemy. Get pick-ups to gain advantage.

Controls

Xbox controller:
Move - Left analog
Jump - A
Attack - X
Use pickup - Y

Fallback input method
Keyboard:
P1:
Move - AD
Jump - W
Attack - Space
Use pickup - E

P2:
Move - left/right arrow
Jump - up arrow
Attack - numPad Enter
Use pickup - numPad Dot/Del

Credits

Agnieszka Marcinkiewicz- 2D graphics
Justyna Jakubiak -  animations
Kinga Litwin - rigging, animations
Sebastian Senski - programming
Marcin Wierzchoś - programming
Weronika Wietrzyńska - 3D graphics

Warsaw Film School Game Jam 2018 submission
